title: Ranked is unplayable due to queue times.
body:
12 minute queue time and counting for a plat 4 Game, this isn't ok.

This system was ambitious, a little too ambitious for Oce.

I have many other complaints about this system then just the queue times. Please revert for Oce.

replies.body: Have to agree, was a decent half hour before me and a full party found a lobby that wasn't dodged the other day

and a lot of the dodges are caused by the client not popping up when it is your turn to pick/ban, it's a bug that can be fixed by repairing however it will quickly begin to happen again, i have given up repairing.
